name: webmusic
description: 1. open first terimal ``` git clone git@github.com:wojiaofengzhongzhuifeng/webMusic-1.git cd webMusic-1 npm install http-server -c-1 ``` 2. 打开 http://127.0.0.1:8080/src/index.html 3. open second terimal ``` cd webMusic-1 node server 8888 ``` 4. 打开 http://127.0.0.1:8080/src/admin.html
